data.title: Laltre Organic Costers del Segre DOP 2017 - La Gravera
data.meta_description: Our Score: 89 - The Lagravera cellar is a pioneer of organic winemaking in Catalunya, Spain. The typical grapes here are Monastrell (Mourvèdre), Garnacha Tinta (Grenache Rouge), and some international grapes such as Merlot, which is the case of this specific bottle. The result is a very nice and easy to drink wine.
data.text:
Our Score: 89

The Lagravera cellar, pioneer of organic viticulture and winemaking in Catalunya, Spain, is in a region northwest of Barcellona and south of the Pyrenees. The typical grapes here are Monastrell (Mourvèdre), Garnacha Tinta (Grenache Rouge), and some international grapes such as Merlot, which is used in the case of this specific bottle.

The result is a very nice and easy to drink wine, smooth enough but definitively crisp at the palate, with fine tannins. At the nose, it is fruity and spicy, with black and blueberries, chocolate, paprika, smoked chestnuts and a touch of minerality coming from the alluvial gravel soil.

Grapes: Monastrell (Mourvèdre), Garnacha Tinta (Grenache Rouge), Merlot

Pairing: It needs food for sure, and it is particularly good with eggs and bacon, a burger or roasted chicken and potatoes.

Appellation: Costers del Segre DOP, Catalunya Spain

SHIPPING

We ship within the United States, in the states in which shipping is possible; the list changes periodically but it is always updated on the cart and you will be able to place your order only if we ship there. We do not ship to PO Boxes, APO and FPOs. Orders typically ship out in 3-5 days and will be delivered according to the shipping mode selected at checkout.

Please make sure there will be a person 21 or older to accept delivery at the address you have selected. The carriers will make 3 attempts to deliver the wine before returning it. In this case please contact us; a return and re-ship fee may apply.

We strongly suggest to sign up for the free UPS MY Choice service, so you can manage your deliveries according to your preferences, and never miss a package.

We respect the environment by using all recyclable/recycled materials in our packaging.

RETURN POLICY

Because it is wine, returns are not typically possible, but we work on a case by case basis with our members to resolve any issues. Please contact us and we will try to understand your issue and find a solution.
